con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:demo" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="urn:demo" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:demo"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <xsd:complexType name="returnProduct"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="ProductId" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="ProductName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="category_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="category_name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="arraydata"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="SOAP-ENC:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="SOAP-ENC:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="tns:returnProduct[]" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="returnAllProduct"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="ProductId" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="ProductName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="category_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="category_name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="arrayAlldata"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="SOAP-ENC:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="SOAP-ENC:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="tns:returnProduct[]" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="returnProductKeyWord"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="ProductId" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="ProductName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Description" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="category_id" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="category_name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="arraydataKeyWord"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="SOAP-ENC:Array"> <xsd:attribute ref="SOAP-ENC:arrayType" wsdl:arrayType="tns:returnProductKeyWord[]" xmlns:wsdl1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="addProductRequest"> <part name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/> <part name="description" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="category_id" type="xsd:integer"/> </message> <message name="addProductResponse"> <part name="addResults" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="updateProductRequest"> <part name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> <part name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/> <part name="description" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="category_id" type="xsd:integer"/> </message> <message name="updateProductResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="searchByIdRequest"> <part name="id" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="searchByIdResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:arraydata"/> </message> <message name="readAllProductsRequest"> <part name="" type="tns:"/> </message> <message name="readAllProductsResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:arrayAlldata"/> </message> <message name="searchByKeywordRequest"> <part name="id" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="searchByKeywordResponse"> <part name="return" type="tns:arraydataKeyWord"/> </message> <message name="deleteByIdRequest"> <part name="id" type="xsd:integer"/> </message> <message name="deleteByIdResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <portType name="demoPortType"> <operation name="addProduct"> <input message="tns:addProductRequest"/> <output message="tns:addProductResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="updateProduct"> <input message="tns:updateProductRequest"/> <output message="tns:updateProductResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="searchById"> <input message="tns:searchByIdRequest"/> <output message="tns:searchByIdResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="readAllProducts"> <input message="tns:readAllProductsRequest"/> <output message="tns:readAllProductsResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByKeyword"> <input message="tns:searchByKeywordRequest"/> <output message="tns:searchByKeywordResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="deleteById"> <input message="tns:deleteByIdRequest"/> <output message="tns:deleteByIdResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="demoBinding" type="tns:demoPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="addProduct"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/addProduct" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="updateProduct"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/updateProduct" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="searchById"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/searchById" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="readAllProducts"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/readAllProducts" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="searchByKeyword"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/searchByKeyword" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:demo" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="deleteById"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://localhost/demo/services.php/deleteById" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="demo"> <port name="demoPort" binding="tns:demoBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:81/demo/services.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <addProduct soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">\r <name xsi:type="xsd:string">Sumsung J6 plus</name>\r <price xsi:type="xsd:decimal">4000.00</price>\r <description xsi:type="xsd:string">Android 8</description>\r <category_id xsi:type="xsd:integer">2</category_id>\r </addProduct>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: updateProduct
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <updateProduct soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">\r <id xsi:type="xsd:integer">${#TestCase#id}</id>\r <name xsi:type="xsd:string">Testing Sample updated</name>\r <price xsi:type="xsd:decimal">10000</price>\r <description xsi:type="xsd:string">price reduced</description>\r <category_id xsi:type="xsd:integer">3</category_id>\r </updateProduct>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
